data.text: @YittleP @nohomelikeplace @wsbgnl That’s also because this younger person should not take the risk of Paxlovid

@nohomelikeplace @wsbgnl a Rx. they said there isn't enough paxlovid to just give to everyone who tests positive. so they're saving it for the elderly and people w/ underlying health cond. they sent her home w/ tylenol and motrin.

@nohomelikeplace @wsbgnl that plan wasn't happening anyway. a teacher friend tested positive this week. the hospital said they don't have paxlovid at the hospital, that they'd have to write her a Rx. but since she's young-ish and doesn't have any sig underlying health cond, they wouldn't write her
@wsbgnl They could get the extra money in reconciliation if Prime Minister Manchin would allow it

@nohomelikeplace @wsbgnl She screwed absolutely everything and everyone with this move. She let Republicans whittle the package down to half of what was promised, then tried to claw back existing state programs when GOP wanted more. Dems said no, so she killed the whole package. Biden & Dems are pissed.
@HughThunkIt @wsbgnl And vaccines for children under 5? I knew the tap would close, though already narrowed to a drip, but this is bullshit

@nohomelikeplace @wsbgnl my question about paxvloid is why in the hell biden didn't use the DPA to mass produce it. Apparently there's not gonna be mass supply of it until late 2022? How is that possible

@nohomelikeplace @wsbgnl I think it does. And worse, it eliminates development of updated Covid vaccines and distribution of vaccines to countries in need. It's pretty much a total failure orchestrated by the octogenarian behind the old Blue deal, or whatever they call it, who won't get out of the way.
